{"__typename":"RiskHazardsWithMethod","methodDescription":"Standard Procedure for Greasing of Crane Wire","hazards":[{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Personnel falling from height","existingMeasures":"1. All control measures for working aloft - Utilize stage or ladder for work beyond normal reach.
2. Cranes should be stationary while accessing.
3. PPE including safety harness.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":4,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":4,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Tools dropping from height","existingMeasures":"1. 2. Warning signs around work area","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":4,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":3,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Failure of rigging Equipment","existingMeasures":"1. All rigging equipment, including Bosun chair, Stage and ropes to be inspected before put in use.
2. Job to be carried out by experienced staff.
Personnel to wear harness attached to a safety rope","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":4,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":3,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Rolling and pitching of vessel","existingMeasures":"1. Job to be aborted if vessel movement due to rolling/pitching makes it unsafe","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Trip and fall hazards - Wire laid out on deck, grease/oil stains","existingMeasures":"1. Work area to be cleared of all obstructions.
2. Warning signs set up around work area.
3. Proper PPE is used.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":2,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":2,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Physical Injury related to winch operation","existingMeasures":"1. A powered appliance should always have a person at the controls while it is in operation; it should never be left to run with a control secured in the ON position.
2. Every signaler should be in a position that is:
(a) safe; and
(b) in plain view of the person to whom they are signaling unless an effective system of radio or other contact is in use.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":4,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":4,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null}]}
